intro: META is a token on Solana using the SPL token standard. The token maintains both mint and freeze authorities indicating centralized control over token operations.

risk_factors: Has mint authority - tokens can be minted
Has freeze authority - accounts can be frozen

authority_analyses.mint_authority: AuthorityAnalysis(address='24HhnMwoyF8XQjuawmaHzHE5hwwWjdPNEcU7aodVnA9w', authority_type='Wallet', capabilities=['Mint unlimited tokens', 'Change mint authority to any address', 'Burn tokens from any account', 'Full unilateral control (no multi-party approval required)'], multisig_info=None, governance_info=None, risk_assessment={'risk_level': 'high', 'reason': 'Single wallet control - centralized authority', 'mitigations': []})
authority_analyses.freeze_authority: AuthorityAnalysis(address='24HhnMwoyF8XQjuawmaHzHE5hwwWjdPNEcU7aodVnA9w', authority_type='Wallet', capabilities=['Freeze any token account instantly', 'Unfreeze any token account instantly', 'Change freeze authority to any address', 'Full unilateral control (no multi-party approval required)'], multisig_info=None, governance_info=None, risk_assessment={'risk_level': 'high', 'reason': 'Single wallet control - centralized authority', 'mitigations': []})
authority_analyses.update_authority: AuthorityAnalysis(address='DMbYvx7cxgXg2ZsZ7g2Vxw4Nj7ZLKvyHqogr8YpyFfFq', authority_type='Wallet', capabilities=['Full unilateral control (no multi-party approval required)'], multisig_info=None, governance_info=None, risk_assessment={'risk_level': 'high', 'reason': 'Single wallet control - centralized authority', 'mitigations': []})

recommendations: Consider decentralizing mint_authority - current setup is high risk
Consider decentralizing freeze_authority - current setup is high risk
Consider decentralizing update_authority - current setup is high risk

key_findings: Token contract has a freeze authority. This authority can pause the contract or selectively censor individual users.
Minter authority is a 1/2 multisig that interacts with an implementation of LayerZero. RBTC is bridged to Solana from Rootstock.
We have detected a possible upgrade authority related to the core contracts. We are investigating this further.
